thread.title: UK PM's fresh start again falls flat

title: UK PM's fresh start again falls flat
text:
UK PM's fresh start again falls flat 10:19am GMT - 01:31 
British Prime Minister Theresa May is under fire again after a cabinet reshuffle to reassert her authority appears to have raised further questions about her grip on power. Reuters William James has been taking the temperature of the reaction in Westminster.   
British Prime Minister Theresa May is under fire again after a cabinet reshuffle to reassert her authority appears to have raised further questions about her grip on power. Reuters William James has been taking the temperature of the reaction in Westminster.  //reut.rs/2CWaJrL
